import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Tilt from 'react-vanilla-tilt' import Ethos from './Ethos' import Parallax from 'react-rellax' import { motion } from "framer-motion" const Shop = ({ products, tees }) => { return (

HOODIES & TEES

{products.map(product => (

{product.title}

$ {product.price} USD

))}
{tees.map(tee => (

{tee.title}

$ {tee.price} USD
))}
) } export default Shop
